title: vandAlum varAdiDinum
sahitya:
vandAlum varAdiDinum (nI) (un) vazhi pArttE ninriDuvEn nI


anupallavi

  cintai ninaikkum un sundara mukhamum vindai kATTum undan
vEDikkai palavum sondam koNDADi nAn ninaindirundE nI


caraNam    santatam unai ninai tava muni yOgiyarum vandanai seidunai
vaNangiDum bhaktarum cindu pala pADi pugazhndiDum palavarum
			(madhyamakAla)
kandan unaki-kANa kAvi uDutti kAvaDi eDuttum karangaL sunamdum
vandaDaivOrkk-aruL tandiDa viraindE enai marandAlum nI
